item.description:
Giardino's Family Restaurant has been a landmark for over 40 years in the Yarmouth area of Cape Cod and the home of the original Tastee Tower. Their pizza is still known to most who visit the Cape every year to be one of the best around. From their appetizers to fresh salads and famous antipasto to homemade clam chowder, fresh daily seafood, pasta dishes, chicken & veal! If you like Keno….you can play at Giardino’s

 

 SOME OF OUR MOST POPULAR “OFF SEASON” SPECIALS:  

*Giardino’s Famous Antipasto and a whole Cheese Pizza (Both for $10.99)

*Prime Rib (Every Thursday Night while it Lasts $10.99) No Salad at this price

 

MOST POPULAR DINNER SPECIALS ARE AS FOLLOWS AND WHILE QUANTITIES LAST. All DINNER SPECIALS ARE SERVED WITH SALAD OR SOUP, POTATO & VEGETABLE, EXCEPT FOR FRIED SEAFOOD DISHES WHICH COME WITH FRENCH FRIES & COLE SLAW

*Baked Scrod

*Baked or Fried Scallops

*Homemade Stuffed Chicken Cordon Bleu

*Marinated Steak Tips

*Baked Ziti with Chicken Parmesan

*Prime Rib (Served Every Sat. & Sun while it lasts)

*Half Roasted Italian Chicken

group.name: "Girls Just Wanna Have Fun!" Women Social Meetup Group

item.name: Dinner at Giardino's
